text: Dante is the main character of Devil May Cry. He is a half-demon, son of the legendary demon warrior Sparda, and twin brother of Vergil. ==Portrayals== Dante has been played by Reuben Langdon. Category:Devil May Cry Category:Fictional characters introduced in 2001 Category:Fictional twins Category:Marvel vs. Capcom fighters Category:Video game protagonists Category:Video game bosses
title: Dante (Devil May Cry)
